attributes.action: Freeze bonus payments to Nationalised or part-Nationalised Banks until all government loans are repaid
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In the current economic climate many firms are cutting wages, hours and or staff.
Troubled Banks which have been Nationalised or part-Nationalised should not be excempt from economic reality.  The government should make this a strict condition on lending to troubled Banks in the future.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
